Functions

 rcPageIndex ($style=rcSTYLE_NO_SECTIONS_TITLES_DASH_SPLIT)

Detailed Description

Theme Methods

These plugin methods are to be used within theme templates

Function Documentation

rcPageIndex ( $  style = rcSTYLE_NO_SECTIONS_TITLES_DASH_SPLIT  ) 

Returns the index menu in a chosen style Usage: <plug:rcPageIndex rcSTYLE_INDEXHIBIT_SECTIONAL />

Parameters:
string style The style to format the menu
